original_text: That the slayer might flee thither, which should kill his neighbour unawares, and hated him not in times past; and that fleeing unto one of these cities he might live:
korean_text: 이는 과거에 원한이 없이 부지중에 살인한 자가 그 곳으로 도피하게 하기 위함이며 그 중 한 성읍으로 도피한 자가 그의 생명을 보전하게 하기 위함이라

sentences.original_text: That the slayer might flee thither,
which should kill his neighbour unawares,
and hated him not in times past;
and that fleeing unto one of these cities
